short_summary: Vendor to fabricate and assemble Printed Circuit Board (PCB) assemblies.
description: The National Research Council Canada (NRC) has a requirement for the fabrication and assembly of various Printed Circuit Board (PCB) assemblies. Task Authorizations will be issued on an "as and when requested basis." The work consists of component acquisition and qualification, PCB assembly, test, and delivery of PCB assemblies in either of the two NRC Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics sites located in Penticton full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Printed Circuit Board Assemblies**

**Reference Number:** WS3775455122
**Solicitation Number:** WS3775455122
**Publication Date:** July 21, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** September 15, 2023, at 14:00:00

**Summary:**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking a contractor to fabricate and assemble various Printed Circuit Board (PCB) assemblies. This tender is invite-only, with Task Authorizations issued on an "as and when requested basis." The successful contractor will be responsible for acquiring and qualifying components, assembling and testing PCB assemblies, and delivering them to one of two NRC Herzberg Astronomy and Astrophysics sites in Penticton and Victoria, BC.

**Tender Details:**

* Unspsc: 32101500 (Circuit assemblies and radio frequency RF components)
* Procurement Category: SRV
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of Opportunity: None
* Regions of Delivery: British Columbia

**Contact Information:**

Contracting Entity:
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

Contact:
Kelsey Locke, Senior Contracting Officer, PSPC
Email: [kelsey.locke@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kelsey.locke@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Phone: Not Available
Fax: Not Available

**Documentation:**

Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16944618?extsite=MTY5NDQ2MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

Attachments: None

**Additional Information:**

Please note that this tender has expired and is no longer accepting submissions. However, interested contractors can contact Kelsey Locke for further information. There is no guarantee that this tender will be re-opened. This notice was originally published in English and French. Relevant documentation may be bilingual (English and French). Please note that all communications and submittals must be in English or French. Même si toutes les communications et les soumissions doivent être en français ou en anglais.  [1](https
